about_the_game:
"He has made my flesh and my skin waste away;

he has broken my bones;

he has besieged and enveloped me

with bitterness and tribulation;

he has made me dwell in darkness

like the dead of long ago."

Description

The United States military has been notified about civilians and research groups going missing within what they call "the backrooms". A highly classified entrance into this mysterious complex has been found in an old abandoned building located in Northern Alaska. Enter and explore the complex using a strange and unknown elevator. Go down alone or with your team to search multiple floors of the backrooms for answers and escape with your life!

Gameplay

Equip your loadout before each floor to face off against creatures wandering the rooms waiting for you below! Sneak, shoot, and pray as you solve puzzles and unlock the mystery surrounding the missing civilians. Get the elevator working again to make your escape and collect your rewards! Die though, and become another casualty of this horrifying nightmare.

PvE Dungeon Crawling

Find money and loot to escape with! At the end of each match, your score is tallied and GP is added to your player account. Use this GP to purchase more powerful weapons, attachments, ability upgrades, ammo, and more before each descent. Build your money pool to tackle the more challenging backroom floors that await!

PvPvE Wager Extraction

Face off against other survivors to make it out of the backrooms first! Each player gets one life and whatever they purchase on the loadout screen before the match. Wager pools of money with your friends before the match begins, and then scramble your way out first or be the last one standing to collect the spoils!

Features

  • Dynamic FPS gameplay

  • Multiplayer Co-op

  • Lobby Browser

  • Interactive puzzles

  • PvPvE Wager Extraction game mode

  • Boss monsters

  • Multiple difficulties for high replayability

  • Steam Achievement support

  • Steam Leaderboards support

  • Over 30+ loadout options

  • Unlock 40 Different Weapon Skins

  • Multiple different builds to play as!

Release Dates

  • Expected February 2025

  • Steam Next Fest Demo October 14 - 21 2024
